nodes.text: Corvis was a male Human smuggler.

He was a member of Talon Karrde's organization during the Thrawn campaign, serving as a gunner on Karrde's flagship and mobile base of operations, the Wild Karrde. During 19 ABY, Corvis worked the comm station onboard the Starry Ice.
His name is misspelled as "Corvus" in Specter of the Past.
